title: 包裝飲用水及盛裝飲用水微生物衛生標準
title_en: Sanitation Standard for the Microorganism in Bottled and Packaged Drinking Water
short_name: Sanitation Standard for the Microorganism in Bottled and Packaged Drinking Water
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 廢止法規＞衛生福利部. Articles extracted: 4.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本標準依食品安全衛生管理法第十七條規定訂定之。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 本標準適用於供人飲用之包裝飲用水及盛裝飲用水。
